nodes.text: A grape was a fruit that grew in bunches. Lumiya ate a bowl of grapes while communicating with Tathak K'roylan. Yuuzhan Vong clusterships resembled bunches of grapes.
Some types of grapes grew deep in oceans.
Both the Corellian and Alderaanian folklores had a story about a boy in the forest, who was leaving a trail of grapes behind him to find his way home.
